page.title: 14Homelife.
page.content: A Pebworth family Sunday: Steve,my husband brings me tea in bed, Richard (l3 yrs) dresses in Sea Cadet Uniform for Parade. Russell (l0yrs) breakfasts on cereals and toast then cycles on his B.M.X. to Long Marston to soccer practice. I was and blow dry my hair. Steve takes Richard to Stratford then works on our house extension. I tidy the house and walk the dog. My friend calls for coffee. After a snack lunch Steve goes to the Mason's Arms Pub, Russell & a friend go cycling & I go to Long Marston market. On return, I cook roast beef etc. and a pie in the oven & microwave. I light a log fire and we all enjoy our meal. Steve washes up, I read the Sunday Times. Since I go out to work each morning I do the ironing. Steve & I relax and watch T.V. before going to bed at l0.45 pm.
